WorkItem.Description: I need to come up with a better way of doing localization. Currently I have been using the VS resource manager for strings. I need to put this in a satellite assembly so that translations can be done by a non-programmer. I will initially add a dll that uses the VS resource manager that will be called from all other assemblies.
WorkItem.Summary: A better way to implement localization.

Comments.Message: So... what about the help document? Is it possible for a resource file to store method/class/property summery? -Rabbit

This one is going to be hard I think.

All of the tools that I know of read the XML directly. Any reference to a method in a resource file would not be run. It would just show up as text.

I will do some research and see how others may do it.
